title: The Breakup Artist (Full Movie) Romantic Comedy

sources.title: The Breakup Artist (Full Movie) Romantic Comedy
sources.description:
Jim is a chick magnet with Relationship Attention Deficit Disorder. His hilarious trip down the twisted road of romance to its surprising destination is hip, touching and fresh.

Director: Vincent Rubino
Writers: Vincent Rubino (screenplay), Pamela Thur (screenplay) (as Pamela Thur-Weir)
Stars: Joseph Lyle Taylor, Paula Devicq, Ron Mongeluzzo, Regis Philbin, Bobby Cannavale
2004

Edited for YouTube ad standards
